ScheduleBroadcastAppointment.name: ScheduleBroadcastAppointment
ScheduleBroadcastAppointment.description: Represents appointments that schedulers broadcast to resources using a schedule broadcast.

Address.description: The address of the appointment where the home visit is performed.

AppointmentReferenceId.description: The appointment associated with the schedule broadcast appointment.

City.description: The city of the appointment address.

Country.description: The country of the appointment address.

EndDateTime.description: The end date and time of the appointment.

GeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically provides this value based on the address’s latitude and longitude coordinates.

IsAccepted.description: Indicates whether a care resource has accepted the appointment (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Latitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address.

Longitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address.

PostalCode.description: The postal code of the appointment address.

ScheduleBroadcastId.description: The schedule broadcast associated with the schedule broadcast appointment.

StartDateTime.description: The start date and time of the appointment.

State.description: The state of the appointment address.

Street.description: The street of the appointment address.

WorkTypeId.description: The work type associated with the schedule broadcast appointment.
